articles.content: Joshua Da Silva’s mother has expressed her desire to see the West Indies cricketer in Royal Challengers Bangalore’s team. She recently met Virat Kohli during the second Test between the two countries… [+360 chars]

articles.title: Texas Super Kings take inspiration from MS Dhoni-led CSK, make it to playoffs in a stunning way - Crictoday.com (Cricket News)
articles.description: Texas Super Kings beat San Francisco Unicorns to secure a berth in the playoffs stage of the inaugural season of the Major League Cricket.
articles.content: The Texas Super Kings pulled off a sensational chase to secure their place in the playoffs of the inaugural MLC season. The Super Kings chased down a challenging target of 172 with three wickets to s… [+2800 chars]
